value:
$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Triandra... No—wait...
Y-you're my...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Before, I was so powerless...$k$pAs the older sister, I should have
done something. But I never could...
I could never stop the abuse.$k$pAnd for that I could never
forgive myself...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|But...if I drank the dream nectar...
I would have the power I needed.$k$p$EFace_Anger|I would be a hero. I would save
the world, protect everyone...$k$pThose who treated others as my
sister had been treated would die.$k$p...And I would see to their deaths
personally. That is MY dream.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...I have nothing left.$k$pForgive me... I wanted to keep
you safe just...a while longer...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...S-sister...$k$p*sob*$k$p

$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Me? Umm... I want to be a hero
because I... I...$k$pI love seeing my sister smile.$k$pIt's so big and bright... She looks
just like a princess. I could never
be that happy...$k$pBut she smiles less and less...
Because of him.$k$pI want to protect her. No matter
what it takes, I want her to be safe.$k$pBut I...$k$pWill she still smile if she learns
what it took? What I had to do?$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
